original_text: So Satan went out from the presence of the Lord and afflicted Job with painful sores from the soles of his feet to the crown of his head.
korean_text: 사탄이 이에 여호와 앞에서 물러가서 욥을 쳐서 그의 발바닥에서 정수리까지 종기가 나게 한지라

sentences.original_text: So Satan went out from the presence of the Lord
and afflicted Job with painful sores
from the soles of his feet to the crown of his head
